titles.title: Supporting the removal of Turkish occupation troops from the Republic of Cyprus.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
8/4/2007--Introduced.
Urges the withdrawal of Turkish occupation troops from the Republic of Cyprus. Calls upon the U.S. government to advocate for such removal. Expresses support for implementation of the July 2006 agreement as the best way to prepare for new negotiations leading to Cyprus' reunification.
